snippet: Spanish tennis star Rafael Nadal inaugurated the Rafa Nadal Academy by Movistar on his home island of Mallorca on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Spanish tennis star Rafael Nadal inaugurated the Rafa Nadal Academy by Movistar on his home island of Mallorca on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal Inaugurates Tennis Academy in Spanish Hometown
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Inaugurates Tennis Academy in Spanish Hometown
